text: Aluminium hydroxide is a chemical compound with the formula . It is one of the most important aluminium compounds, used in the Bayer process to purify aluminium and alumina from ores like bauxite. Aluminium hydroxide is an example of an amphoteric hydroxide, a type of chemical which can act as either an acid or a base. In the Bayer process, aluminium hydroxide is an acid that reacts with sodium hydroxide to make hydrated sodium aluminate, . It reacts as a base with sulfuric acid to make aluminium sulfate.
